title: ulilema
author: ulilema
content: Do you want to learn Russian online, but the variety of online schools makes you dizzy?Come to the school of the Russian language "Leader".A modern approach to teaching, a concise program and strong school teachers will help you improve your spoken and written language level. Our teachers are practicing teachers who have completed language training.Why Russian language school "Leader"?* we will select for you the optimal format of classes: group or individual;* for adults, teenagers and children;* we work with private and corporate clients;* we teach using a communicative methodology, which involves the study of all language competencies (listening, speaking, reading and writing)For new clients, the trial lesson is FREE!For more information, contact school managers.Russian Language School “Leader”https://golearnrussian.com/

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: It's probably a good idea to learn Russian. If the US and Nato keep on pushing her, they will make her mad, and we might wind up needing Russian just to live.

comments.author: Car22
comments.body: I want to learn Russian language because i want to visit Russia for study. So it is easy and convenient before i went to Russia for study.
